author: Reverie Field Project
description: Run a Reverie Field Project game task to earn $SONO KPL tokens. This task synchronizes and validates player data for the "Reverie Field" game, a decentralized platform where players earn rewards by participating in in-game activities. The task fetches player data from the server, caches it, and submits it to IPFS for validation. A lenient validation process allows up to 10% tolerance for discrepancies, ensuring fair reward distribution even with minor data differences.
